page.title: 08 Life of 2 Teenagers in Well
page.content:
by A.Buckle,S.Leigh,N.Wreford,E.Lewis.
We interviewed two teenagers,Tracy Moody(13) and Amanda Sillence(19). Tracy attends La Sagesse Convent School while Amanda is unemployed.They both like Wellow because it is quiet. Amanda feels there are not enough jobs. She has no qualifications.Tracy has lived in Wellow all her life,Amanda has not been there long but intends to stay. Amanda says there is no social life for her in Wellow as she is older, but Trac has plenty of clubs for her age group like discos,youth clubs,Brownies and Guides. Amanda thinks there is a lot of support from villagers for unemployed people.This shows us that Wellow offers more facilities for younger teenagers. By E.Lemmer,V.Sewell,K.Vanson and K.Preston
